import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import ReactPlayer from "react-player"; export const Admincardscontent = () => { const location = useLocation(); const { mealDetail, ingredients, imageId, title, type } = location.state; useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); return (

My Food App

{title}

{mealDetail}

Type:

{type}

Ingredients

{ingredients.join(", ")}

); };
